hero_subtitle: Track expenses, manage income, and achieve financial awareness with Flux, your personal finance companion
feature1_desc: Gain deep insights into your spending patterns with comprehensive analytics. Track income vs expenses, visualize trends with interactive charts, and receive personalized financial recommendations to optimize your budget and savings goals.
feature2_desc: Effortlessly manage all your financial records with our intuitive CRUD interface. Add, edit, categorize, and delete transactions in real-time, with instant updates across all your devices for seamless financial tracking.
feature3_desc: Digitize your receipts for effortless record-keeping. Simply upload images of your receipts, automatically categorize them by transaction type, and maintain organized digital records for tax purposes and expense tracking.
feature4_desc: Use Flux in your preferred language with automatic currency formatting. Switch seamlessly between English and Indonesian, with all monetary values displayed in your local currency format for better financial clarity.
